            "title": [
              [
                "public static <V extends View> BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike<V> from(V view) {\n    ViewGroup.LayoutParams params = view.getLayoutParams();\n    if (!(params instanceof CoordinatorLayout.LayoutParams)) {\n        throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"The view is not a child of CoordinatorLayout\");\n    }\n    CoordinatorLayout.Behavior behavior = ((CoordinatorLayout.LayoutParams) params)\n            .getBehavior();\n    if (!(behavior instanceof BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike)) {\n        throw new IllegalArgumentException(\n                \"The view is not associated with BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike\");\n    }\n    return (BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike<V>) behavior;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "public void onStopNestedScroll(CoordinatorLayout coordinatorLayout, V child, View target) {\n    if (child.getTop() == mMinOffset) {\n        setStateInternal(STATE_EXPANDED);\n        return;\n    }\n    if (target != mNestedScrollingChildRef.get() || !mNestedScrolled) {\n        return;\n    }\n    int top;\n    int targetState;\n    if (mLastNestedScrollDy > 0) {\n        //top = mMinOffset;\n        //targetState = STATE_EXPANDED;\n        int currentTop = child.getTop();\n        if (currentTop > mAnchorPoint) {\n            top = mAnchorPoint;\n            targetState = STATE_ANCHOR_POINT;\n        }\n        else {\n            top = mMinOffset;\n            targetState = STATE_EXPANDED;\n        }\n    } else if (mHideable && shouldHide(child, getYVelocity())) {\n        top = mParentHeight;\n        targetState = STATE_HIDDEN;\n    } else if (mLastNestedScrollDy == 0) {\n        int currentTop = child.getTop();\n        if (Math.abs(currentTop - mMinOffset) < Math.abs(currentTop - mMaxOffset)) {\n            top = mMinOffset;\n            targetState = STATE_EXPANDED;\n        } else {\n            top = mMaxOffset;\n            targetState = STATE_COLLAPSED;\n        }\n    } else {\n        //top = mMaxOffset;\n        //targetState = STATE_COLLAPSED;\n        int currentTop = child.getTop();\n        if (currentTop > mAnchorPoint) {\n            top = mMaxOffset;\n            targetState = STATE_COLLAPSED;\n        }\n        else {\n            top = mAnchorPoint;\n            targetState = STATE_ANCHOR_POINT;\n        }\n    }\n    if (mViewDragHelper.smoothSlideViewTo(child, child.getLeft(), top)) {\n        setStateInternal(STATE_SETTLING);\n        ViewCompat.postOnAnimation(child, new SettleRunnable(child, targetState));\n    } else {\n        setStateInternal(targetState);\n    }\n    mNestedScrolled = false;\n}\n\npublic final void setState(@State int state) {\n    if (state == mState) {\n        return;\n    }\n    if (mViewRef == null) {\n        // The view is not laid out yet; modify mState and let onLayoutChild handle it later\n        /**\n         * New behavior (added: state == STATE_ANCHOR_POINT ||)\n         */\n        if (state == STATE_COLLAPSED || state == STATE_EXPANDED ||\n                state == STATE_ANCHOR_POINT ||\n                (mHideable && state == STATE_HIDDEN)) {\n            mState = state;\n        }\n        return;\n    }\n    V child = mViewRef.get();\n    if (child == null) {\n        return;\n    }\n    int top;\n    if (state == STATE_COLLAPSED) {\n        top = mMaxOffset;\n    } else if (state == STATE_ANCHOR_POINT) {\n        top = mAnchorPoint;\n    } else if (state == STATE_EXPANDED) {\n        top = mMinOffset;\n    } else if (mHideable && state == STATE_HIDDEN) {\n        top = mParentHeight;\n    } else {\n        throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Illegal state argument: \" + state);\n    }\n    setStateInternal(STATE_SETTLING);\n    if (mViewDragHelper.smoothSlideViewTo(child, child.getLeft(), top)) {\n        ViewCompat.postOnAnimation(child, new SettleRunnable(child, state));\n    }\n}"
              ]
            ]

          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550451805207,
          "parent_id": "3b4bd20a-901a-411c-9d24-dcfcdae895b9",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "public boolean onLayoutChild(CoordinatorLayout parent, V child, int layoutDirection) {\n    // First let the parent lay it out\n    if (mState != STATE_DRAGGING && mState != STATE_SETTLING) {\n        if (ViewCompat.getFitsSystemWindows(parent) &&\n                !ViewCompat.getFitsSystemWindows(child)) {\n            ViewCompat.setFitsSystemWindows(child, true);\n        }\n        parent.onLayoutChild(child, layoutDirection);\n    }\n    // Offset the bottom sheet\n    mParentHeight = parent.getHeight();\n    mMinOffset = Math.max(0, mParentHeight - child.getHeight());\n    mMaxOffset = Math.max(mParentHeight - mPeekHeight, mMinOffset);\n\n    //if (mState == STATE_EXPANDED) {\n    //    ViewCompat.offsetTopAndBottom(child, mMinOffset);\n    //} else if (mHideable && mState == STATE_HIDDEN...\n    if (mState == STATE_ANCHOR_POINT) {\n        ViewCompat.offsetTopAndBottom(child, mAnchorPoint);\n    } else if (mState == STATE_EXPANDED) {\n        ViewCompat.offsetTopAndBottom(child, mMinOffset);\n    } else if (mHideable && mState == STATE_HIDDEN) {\n        ViewCompat.offsetTopAndBottom(child, mParentHeight);\n    } else if (mState == STATE_COLLAPSED) {\n        ViewCompat.offsetTopAndBottom(child, mMaxOffset);\n    }\n    if (mViewDragHelper == null) {\n        mViewDragHelper = ViewDragHelper.create(parent, mDragCallback);\n    }\n    mViewRef = new WeakReference<>(child);\n    mNestedScrollingChildRef = new WeakReference<>(findScrollingChild(child));\n    return true;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
      "4baf831a-f771-42b4-b59e-fba7dfaf51ac": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550451805199,
          "id": "4baf831a-f771-42b4-b59e-fba7dfaf51ac",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550451805199,
          "parent_id": "3b4bd20a-901a-411c-9d24-dcfcdae895b9",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "@Override\npublic boolean layoutDependsOn(CoordinatorLayout parent, View child, View dependency) {\n    return dependency instanceof NestedScrollView;\n}\n\n@Override\npublic boolean onDependentViewChanged(CoordinatorLayout parent, View child,\n                                      View dependency) {\n\n    if (mChild == null) {\n        initValues(child, dependency);\n        return false;\n    }\n\n    float dVerticalScroll = dependency.getY() - mPreviousY;\n    mPreviousY = dependency.getY();\n\n    //going up\n    if (dVerticalScroll <= 0 && !hidden) {\n        dismissAppBar(child);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    return false;\n}\n\nprivate void initValues(final View child, View dependency) {\n\n    mChild = child;\n    mInitialY = child.getY();\n\n    BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike bottomSheetBehavior = BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike.from(dependency);\n    bottomSheetBehavior.addBottomSheetCallback(new BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike.BottomSheetCallback() {\n        @Override\n        public void onStateChanged(@NonNull View bottomSheet, @BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike.State int newState) {\n            if (newState == BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike.STATE_COLLAPSED ||\n                    newState == BottomSheetBehaviorGoogleMapsLike.STATE_HIDDEN)\n                showAppBar(child);\n        }\n\n        @Override\n        public void onSlide(@NonNull View bottomSheet, float slideOffset) {\n\n        }\n    });\n}\n\nprivate void dismissAppBar(View child){\n    hidden = true;\n    AppBarLayout appBarLayout = (AppBarLayout)child;\n    mToolbarAnimation = appBarLayout.animate().setDuration(mContext.getResources().getInteger(android.R.integer.config_shortAnimTime));\n    mToolbarAnimation.y(-(mChild.getHeight()+25)).start();\n}\n\nprivate void showAppBar(View child) {\n    hidden = false;\n    AppBarLayout appBarLayout = (AppBarLayout)child;\n    mToolbarAnimation = appBarLayout.animate().setDuration(mContext.getResources().getInteger(android.R.integer.config_mediumAnimTime));\n    mToolbarAnimation.y(mInitialY).start();\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

            "title": [
              [
                "@Override\npublic boolean onDependentViewChanged(CoordinatorLayout parent, View child,\n                                      View dependency) {\n\n    if (mYmultiplier == 0) {\n        initValues(child, dependency);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    float dVerticalScroll = dependency.getY() - mPreviousY;\n    mPreviousY = dependency.getY();\n\n    //going up\n    if (dVerticalScroll <= 0 && child.getY() <= 0) {\n        child.setY(0);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    //going down\n    if (dVerticalScroll >= 0 && dependency.getY() <= mImageHeight)\n        return false;\n\n    child.setY( (int)(child.getY() + (dVerticalScroll * mYmultiplier) ) );\n\n    return true;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "@Override\npublic boolean onDependentViewChanged(CoordinatorLayout parent, FloatingActionButton child, View dependency) {\n\n    if (offset == 0)\n        setOffsetValue(parent);\n\n    if (dependency.getY() <=0)\n        return false;\n\n    if (child.getY() <= (offset + child.getHeight()) && child.getVisibility() == View.VISIBLE)\n        child.hide();\n    else if (child.getY() > offset && child.getVisibility() != View.VISIBLE)\n        child.show();\n\n    return false;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "created_time": 1550451805208,
          "id": "dea2d91b-dcc3-44b9-8941-37fdddb39249",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
